hideAreaUnderButton: Rent bikes or guides
textContent: Discover more about the area, the habits, the history or the mining industry of Rosia Montana. From the accommodation page you can also book bikes, guided tours by bike or walk, or just have a chat with the locals in the Casa Petri gazebo. Then, on arrival, you will meet our guide and configure the trails you will like to do.
